resources.string: The purpose of this app is to allow you to use your mobile phone as a gateway for sending and receiving SMS to/from a list of contacts you administer at https://sms.feriko.fi using the web browser. To use this app, register at https://sms.feriko.fi . After you login, you can use the web service to send SMS through this app and the app will send all SMS you receive back to the web service. Do you accept?
Login using username and password. If you do not have an account yet, you can create one at https://sms.feriko.fi . By using the app, you agree to the Privacy Policy.
Messgae %1$d not sent: radio is off.
Message %1$d not sent: no SMS feature.
There are %1$d messages in the server queue.
Discarding message %1$d due to invalid number %2$s.
Failed to accept message %1$d to be delivered.
Notified the server that message %1$d has been sent.
Failed to notify the server that the message %1$d has been sent.
Notified the server that message %1$d failed to send.
Could not notify the server that message %1$d failed to send.
Delivered received message %1$d to the server.
Could not deliver the received message %1$d to the server.
Delivery notification of message %1$d sent to the server.
Failed to notify the server of the delivery notification of message %1$d.
